Gwion

A strongly timed musical programming language

  • Gwion
  • AST
  • Plugins
  • Features
  • Examples

variadic function take a set of predefined arguments, plus any number of any type of arguments.
they are declared this way:

you can then loop through args:

vararg.start
// more code...
vararg.end

acces is done with:

vararg.i // for int  
vararg.f // for float
vararg.c // for complex TODO: polar
vararg.o // for object

vararg.o can be casted to any object type.

Gwion is maintained by Jérémie Astor. This page was generated by GitHub Pages.
